title: Crunchy Sandwich with Zibas Classic
ingredients: 2 slices of bread of your choice.
½ cup chopped canned red bell pepper.
instructions: Step 1. Spread mayonnaise and mustard on each bread slice. Add 2 slices of cold cuts, then 2 slices of cheese, and continue layering until all are used. Add the olive salad on top, finish with a layer of Zibas Classic, cover with the other slice of bread, and serve.
